[vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_bottom_padding" particles="0"][vc_column width="2/3" heading_align="text-center" align="text-left" margin="margin_bottom_grid"][vc_column_text]The best option to access the CCIB  from the city center by car is to cross the city along Avenida Diagonal until its end. Ronda Litoral (exit 24) is the most direct way to reach the CCIB from the airport or from out of town. An estimate journey time from the airport or the city center is 25 minutes, depending on traffic. FROM AND TO THE AIRPORT The international airport, Aeroport del Prat, is located 13 km south-west of Barcelona and 20 km from the CCIB. The highway C-31 directly connects the airport with Barcelona. To enter the city, the most direct routes to the city center are Avinguda Diagonal and Gran Via  and also Ronda de Dalt and Ronda Litoral, which surround the city. AEROBUS The bus service between the airport and the center of Barcelona (Plaça Catalunya ) runs from 6:00 to 1:00 (to Barcelona) and from 5:30 to 0:15 (to the airport) every day. The bus frequency is one every 10-12 minutes and the journey time is around 30 minutes. TAXI The taxi ride takes about 20 minutes. The rates change depending on the schedule. URBAN PUBLIC TRANSPORT The best options for traveling within the urban area of  Barcelona are: train, bus, metro and tram. Next to Plaça Catalunya there is Urquinaona station or the metro yellow line (L4)  that leads directly to the CCIB byMaresme-Forum station. You can also get to the CCIB by bus: lines 7, H16 and tram: Forum station. All these means of transport  leave you just few minutes away from the CCIB by foot.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" align="text-left" color_set="secondary_section" boxed="boxed_plus"][vc_single_image image="381" img_size="full" onclick="link_image"][vc_text_separator title="VENUE" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black"][vc_column_text]

Crowne Plaza Barcelona

The hotel is set in the heart of Montjuic, one of the most cultural areas of the city. Located between the famous Plaza de Espana and Gran Via Avenue, visit the nearby Montjuic Magic Fountains, Olympic Stadium and Montjuïc Castle. From $160/night[/vc_column_text][plethora_button button_text="Book now" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.barcelonahotelsbookings.com%2Ffira-palace-hotel-barcelona-sants-4-star.html||target:%20_blank|" button_style="btn-primary" button_with_icon="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_padding" cols_valign="vcenter" particles="0"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="64px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="404" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Jazz Hotel

The Jazz Hotel, opened in February 2004, is placed in the heart of Barcelona. Its situation, close to Las Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya, becomes privileged to the tourist who wants to visit the city. From $120/night[/vc_column_text][plethora_button button_text="Book now" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.barcelonahotelsbookings.com%2Fjazz-hotel-barcelona-centre-eixample-3-star.html||target:%20_blank|" button_style="btn-primary" button_with_icon="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" row_padding="no_top_padding" cols_valign="vcenter" particles="0"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="64px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="405" img_size="full"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Hostal Grau Barcelona

The hostal Grau was inaugurated in the year 1941. In the past, the ground floor where the reception is located now, had been a coalyard and the Grau Fabregas family lived in the first floor. From $90/night[/vc_column_text][plethora_button button_text="Book now" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fwww.barcelonahotelsbookings.com%2Fhostal-grau-barcelona-hostel-barcelona-centre-2-star.html||target:%20_blank|" button_style="btn-primary" button_with_icon="0"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

ple-page-subtitle-text: We have made special arrangements with nearby hotels for the attendees

page.post_content:
[vc_row full_width="0" full_height="0" particles="0"][vc_column][vc_empty_space height="64px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3" margin="margin_bottom_grid"][vc_toggle title="When is the Conference held?" el_id="1447064451796-0645cbf1-8947"]You may have referred yourself, have been referred by another specialist or by Medical Insurance. We will discuss your problem and ask about your medical history. A thorough examination will then follow. We may request examinations and tests to assist and support our diagnosis. X-rays, blood / urine analysis, ultrasonography, MRI, endoscopy can all be performed with no delay in the same building. If you have previous examinations and tests related to your current condition, please bring those along to the consultation. Also bring any copies of letters from other doctors or recent medication. It will help us to help you. We will discuss with you the results of your examinations and we will recommend the proper treatment. Some conditions may be faced immediately by conservative or surgical treatment. In case you need surgery requiring general anesthesia, we arrange routine or urgent transfer by quick boat, state or private air ambulance to Athens or to your preferred destination (subject to stable medical condition). In special cases a patient can be escorted. Otherwise, depending on the results of your examinations, the nature of the medical problem and your holiday plan, we will discharge you from our clinic, refer you on to another health professional or book you for surgery. If follow-up consultation or further consultations are required, we will indicate this and the staff will let you know the date and time of your next appointment.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How can I register?" el_id="1447064341323-f6ee47d8-32bf"]If you are an emergency case requiring immediate attention, please call (+555) 959-595-959 or the nurse at (+555) 959-595-959. We will give you instructions and directions. If you know the Medical Centre' s address, please come as quick as possible. If you need transfer by us, please let us know by phone.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Do I need to be a member to participate?" el_id="1447064412741-3e356338-032d"]When you arrive at the Medical Centre, the staff will greet you and seat you at the waiting room. We will examine you as quick as possible - average waiting time is 15 minutes.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="How can I plan my trip to Barcelona?" el_id="1447064507869-5e4ee3bd-a327"]Yes. Ordinary x-rays, panoramic mouth views, ultrasonography , endoscopy, CT-scan, bone mass density scanner or laser imager ( digital developer ) can be performed on location.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can I book a room with a discount?" el_id="1447064555113-315c72fb-176e"]Yes. A Pediatrician is immediately available if needed.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="What does my registration include?" el_id="1447065558213-dca24fc1-47a1"]Certain cases require injections for quick and full recovery. These can include antibiotics, anti-inflammators, local anesthesia or steroids. Steroids and local anesthesia injections are administered by Doctors and anti-inflammators / antibiotics by an experienced nurse under our supervision.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Will there be workshops during the conference?" el_id="1447065583979-54e0b9c1-ae47"]We can undertake only small or minor procedures in our Medical Centre, using local anesthesia or superficial sedation. All other procedures requiring general anesthesia are transferred to Athens or back to patient's destination, to be admitted at a General Hospital.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Can a sponsor cover my expenses?" el_id="1447065607650-fbb48814-35d7"]We may prescribe for example analgesia treatment for your condition. Please let us know in case you have any allergy or other medical condition. If you have already been taking drugs prescribed by your home doctor, please bring them with you for clarification or possible drug interactions and correlations with the new condition.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Insurance and Billing" el_id="1447065636406-978b4ed0-e711"]Do you accept my insurance? Our Medical Centre accepts most of the internationally recognized Insurance companies with affiliate. If this is not your case, or if you have no insurance coverage then you will be expected to pay the bill in cash or credit card at the end of consultation. The original receipt, the signed copy of the credit card bill, the medical report in English and the results of tests performed are given to you in order to be delivered to your private or state insurance for reimbursement. An estimate of consultation fees and costs, investigations or surgery are available on request. Do I need referral? If you have private insurance with an affiliate, the referral can be sent from your insurance company to us by fax or e-mail. We suggest that you contact your insurance in order to obtain this referral before your visit to our offices. If you don't have an insurance coverage, feel free to come to our Medical Centre. The billing procedure is as explained above.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title="Do you have parking facilities?" el_id="1447065710387-d413605d-104e"]Yes. Free Parking is available in front and around the Medical Centre.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" color_set="secondary_section" boxed="boxed" css=".vc_custom_1489743598092{padding-top: 36px !important;padding-right: 24px !important;padding-bottom: 36px !important;padding-left: 24px !important;}"][vc_text_separator title="DATE" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black"][vc_column_text]

June 12–16, 2017

(Wednesday to Sunday)[/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="VENUE" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black"][vc_column_text]

Barcelona Conf Center

Volcano Avenue 1, 1220 Barcelona, Spain [/vc_column_text][vc_text_separator title="CME Accreditation" title_align="separator_align_left" align="align_right" color="black"][vc_column_text]Each delegate has access to confirmation of all activities attended (CME confirmation and record of attendance).[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
